```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)

set.seed(1)
```

```{r}
x_vec = rnorm(25, mean = 5, sd = 3)

(x_vec - mean(x_vec)) / sd(x_vec)

```

write a function to compute z scores

```{r}
z_scores = function(x) {
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  z
}

z_scores(x_vec)
```



```{r}
source("source/sim_mean_sd.R")
```

```{r}
sim_mean_sd = function(n, mu = 2, sigma = 3) {
  
  sim_data = tibble(
    x = rnorm(n, mean = mu, sd = sigma),
  )
  
  sim_data |> 
    summarize(
      mu_hat = mean(x),
      sigma_hat = sd(x)
    )
}
```
